summary: Verified UI updates for EaziWage Employer Portal (gradient icons, filters, Department Distribution) and Employee Portal (light theme revert). All requested features working correctly.
passed_tests: Employer Login: Login with testemployer2@eaziwage.com - SUCCESS
Employer Dashboard: 16 gradient icon elements found (bg-gradient-to-br from-primary to-emerald-600)
Employer Employees page: MetricCards with gradient icons - VERIFIED
Employer Employees page: Date range selectors (From/To) - VISIBLE
Employer Employees page: Country filter dropdown ('All Countries') - WORKING
Employer Employees page: Currency selector ('KES (Ksh)') - WORKING
Employer Employees page: Department Distribution grid layout - NO OVERLAPPING
Department Distribution: CSS Grid with 5 columns (gridTemplateColumns: 236px x 5), gap: 12px
Employer Advances page: MetricCards with gradient icons - VERIFIED
Employer Advances page: Date range selectors (From/To) - VISIBLE
Employer Advances page: Country filter dropdown - WORKING
Employer Advances page: Currency selector - WORKING
Employee Login: Login with demo.employee@eaziwage.com - SUCCESS
Employee Dashboard: Light theme active (HTML class='light')
Employee Dashboard: Body background rgb(255,255,255) (white)
Employee Dashboard: Moon icon shown (light mode toggle)
Employee Dashboard: Balance card visible with Ksh 30,000 available
Employee Dashboard: Stats grid visible (Earned, Payday, Withdrawn, Employer)
Employee Dashboard: Account status section visible
Employee Dashboard: Recent activity section visible
critical_code_review_comments: GOOD: GradientIconBox component uses 'bg-gradient-to-br from-primary to-emerald-600' as specified
GOOD: Department Distribution uses responsive grid (grid-cols-2 sm:grid-cols-3 md:grid-cols-4 lg:grid-cols-5 gap-3)
GOOD: Date range, country filter, and currency selector properly integrated on Employees and Advances pages
GOOD: Employee Dashboard reverted to light theme successfully (dark theme code removed)
GOOD: Theme toggle still available for user preference
context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested UI changes verified: (1) Gradient icons (bg-gradient-to-br from-primary to-emerald-600) render correctly on Employer Dashboard, Employees, and Advances pages; (2) Date range selectors, country filters, and currency selectors visible and functional on Employees and Advances pages; (3) Department Distribution uses CSS Grid layout with no overlapping; (4) Employee Dashboard uses light theme (not dark). MOCKED: Mobile Money APIs, Bank Transfer APIs, Apple Login, Biometric Face Scan.
